item.name: Butcher’s Knife
item.description: “A stainless steel knife used by butchers”

item.name: Butternut Squash recipe
item.description: “A recipe to make a delicious meal”

item.name: Chef’s hat
item.description: “A hat owned by a renowned chef”

person.name: Head Chef Jerald
person.description: “The only man in the world to have earned 4 Michelin stars”
person.dialog: Good thing you’re not the health inspector! BAHAHA

item.name: Dining Table
item.description: “A large table set for eight people.”

person.name: Maid
person.description: “From dusting to vacuuming, maids are professionals hired to keep home”
person.dialog: Dinner will be ready soon, come back then.

item.name: Wine Shelf
item.description: The entire wall is covered in dusty wine bottles, none of them open

item.name: Painting
item.description: Sir Gerald the first of his name, in all his glory

person.name: Wine shanty
person.description: The only person sitting at a large table, wine bottle in hand
person.dialog: ”Can you get me a drink pleashhh”

item.name: Bed
item.description: An elaborate king sized bed with a polished wood frame

item.name: Dresser
item.description: An exquisite Mahogany dresser with not a speck of dust

item.name: Shoe rack
item.description: A multi-level shoe rack containing a diverse spectrum of novelty cowboy boots

item.name: Desk
item.description: A hard wood writing desk topped with quality parchment

item.name: Bookshelf
item.description: A tall wooden bookshelf containing works of all subject matters

item.name: Chair
item.description: A comfortable looking black leather chair

item.name: Clothing rack
item.description: A long metallic clothing rack lined with countless articles of designer clothing

item.name: Vanity Table Set
item.description: A wooden vanity table with a round mirror and cushioned stool

item.name: Clothed Mannequin
item.description: A female mannequin showcasing an oversized fur coat

item.name: Grizzly Bear Rug
item.description: “A furry rug made from the pelt of a grizzly bear”

item.name: Stuffed Tiger Head
item.description: “The stuffed head of a Bengal tiger mounted on a wall”

item.name: Stuffed Moose Head
item.description: The Moose eyes seem to follow you as you move around the room

item.name: Suit of Armor
item.description: A full set of shiny silver plate armor from the renaissance period

item.name: Diamond Halberd
item.description: A decorative reconstruction of a two-handed pole weapon from the 15th century

item.name: M60 Machine Gun
item.description: A heavy machine gun loaded with armor-piercing rounds

item.name: Kar98k Marksman Rifle
item.description: An antique looking marksman rifle with a wooden stock

item.name: Wall mounted paper target
item.description: Whoever was shooting this target got several bullseyes

item.name: Ammunition box
item.description: Metallic ammo box painted military green

item.name: Spring Terror
item.description: A couple running from a forest fire

item.name: Grand Piano
item.description: Slick black color without a blemish on it. Looks like it has never been played

item.name: Cushioned bench
item.description: A wooden bench that is padded with a red velvet cushion

item.name: Pool Table
item.description: “A standard pool table, green felt and six holes.”

item.name: Beer
item.description: “Yup, that's beer in a mug alright.”

item.description: A cozy place for the servant to sleep
